statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT destination_ip, source_ip, data_size, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp, data_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT destination_ip, AVG(data_size) FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING AVG(data_size) > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTPS' AND data_size > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND payload LIKE '%attack%';
SELECT id, timestamp, payload FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip IN ('10.0.0.1', '10.0.0.2') AND destination_ip = '192.168.1.1' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_records > 10;
SELECT * FROM cyber_threats WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY threat_severity DESC;
SELECT MAX(threat_severity) as max_severity, AVG(threat_severity) as avg_severity FROM cyber_threats;
SELECT threat_type, COUNT(*) as total_threats FROM cyber_threats GROUP BY threat_type ORDER BY total_threats DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol='TCP';
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM threat_detection ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT id, action_type, description FROM response_actions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT t.threat_type, t.severity, r.action_type FROM threat_detection t JOIN response_actions r ON t.timestamp = r.timestamp ORDER BY t.severity DESC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip='192.168.1.1' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE destination_ip LIKE '%.com' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, protocol, port FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT destination_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY data_size DESC;
SELECT threat_type, detection_timestamp FROM threat_detection WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY data_size DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' AND port = 80;
SELECT id, threat_type, detection_timestamp FROM threat_detection WHERE severity > 3 ORDER BY detection_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, response_type, response_timestamp, response_details FROM incident_response WHERE response_type = 'Mitigation' ORDER BY response_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM network_devices LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_ip, last_seen_timestamp FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_type = 'Malicious' ORDER BY traffic_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, username FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' AND username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' AND device_name LIKE 'SW%'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE traffic_type = 'Malicious' ORDER BY traffic_timestamp ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT event_type, threat_level FROM threat_events WHERE threat_level > 5
